Notes.Text:
This update for php7 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-4900: Fixed potential buffer overflow via PHP_CLI_SERVER_WORKERS environment variable. (bsc#1209537)
Notes.Title: Details

Notes.Text: The CVRF data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).

Vulnerabilities.Description: A vulnerability was found in PHP where setting the environment variable PHP_CLI_SERVER_WORKERS to a large value leads to a heap buffer overflow.
